MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:53pm. Our engineers are on site currently replacing broken equipment on our overhead line network and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on the 9th April 2021.
